    This method load the data from "CasinoInfo.txt" and reads the file Responsible for checking if the file exist or not
    private void

    This method call promptName from appMenu class It will display to the user "Enter your name", as well checks if the name exists otherwise it will say null and create a new player

    This method saves the game and update the existing file text As well as exits the program

    This method calls the showSubMenu from the appMenu class This method will display the sub menu It will prompt the user for three choices, find top player, search player name, and a return to main menu option

      private final String FILE_PATH
      The GameManager class is what runs the program. The menu and sub menu is controlled in this class As well as launching the game

    • GameManager

      public GameManager() throws Exception
      The method GameManager calls 2 methods, loadData(); and launchApplication();
      Throws:
      Exception

  • Method Details

    • launchApplication

      private void launchApplication() throws Exception
      The method launchApplication is responsible for running the Game. Calls showMainMenu from the appMenu Class(); Displays three choices; 1PlayGame, 2Search, 3Save and Exit Loops until the user hits save and exit
      Throws:
      Exception

    • playGame

      private void playGame() throws Exception
      This method call promptName from appMenu class It will display to the user "Enter your name", as well checks if the name exists otherwise it will say null and create a new player
      Throws:
      Exception

    • search

      private void search()
      This method calls the showSubMenu from the appMenu class This method will display the sub menu It will prompt the user for three choices, find top player, search player name, and a return to main menu option

    • searchByName

      private Player searchByName(String name)

    • findTopPlayer

      private void findTopPlayer()
      This method finds the top player with the most wins in the text file "CasinoInfo.txt"

    • save

      private void save() throws IOException
      This method saves the game and update the existing file text As well as exits the program
      Throws:
      IOException

    • loadData

      private void loadData() throws Exception
      This method load the data from "CasinoInfo.txt" and reads the file Responsible for checking if the file exist or not
      Throws:
      Exception
